name: The Odd Farm
description:
Odd farm. It would seem that what can happen on a conventional farm? And here's what: The King of Toads, which gives the job at the same time. Worms that want to spoil your harvest. And lumberjacks do not chop wood at all, but save the farm from worms.

The controls are intuitively clear.

If you find errors while playing, please let me know.

Have fun!
